product_name: Royal Robbins Slickrock Plaid Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With one of the lightest weight fabrics from Royal Robbins, the Slickrock Plaid Shirt does more than just look handsome and travel well. It wicks moisture, dries fast and protects against the sun. Surprisingly soft blend of nylon and polyester wicks moisture and dries quickly to ensure you stay comfortable on warm-weather adventures. UPF 30 sun protection. Button-close chest pocket and a zippered chest pocket secure a few small essentials. Straight hem with side splits looks great left untucked. The Royal Robbins Slickrock Plaid shirt has a relaxed fit. Closeout.
short_description: With one of the lightest weight fabrics from Royal Robbins, the Slickrock Plaid Shirt does more than just look handsome and travel well. It wicks moisture, dries fast and protects against the sun.
